requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
